effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict damage and lower its accuracy.
